error.signature: missing return at end of function
error.regex: missing return at end of function

verdict.summary: Function declares return type but not all code paths return a value.

dead_ends.action: Add return at the end with zero value
dead_ends.why_fails: May silently return wrong result â€” ensure the logic is correct

dead_ends.action: Change return type to not return anything
dead_ends.why_fails: If callers use the return value, this breaks them

workarounds.action: Ensure every code path (every if/else/switch branch) has a return statement
Add a default return after the if/switch to handle the 'else' case

frequently_confused_with.distinction: 'missing return at end of function' indicates a missing return statement, while 'imported and not used' indicates an unused import.
